reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Install & High-Quality Protection for you!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the LK 4 pack Screen Protectors for my IPhone 12, and I am delighted with the performance and quality that they offer. These screen protectors have proven to be a reliable and effective solution for safeguarding my device's screen, ensuring its longevity and pristine appearance.First and foremost, I was impressed by the ease of installation. The package includes everything needed for a hassle-free application process: clear instructions, a cleaning kit, and an alignment frame. The installation was straightforward, and the provided alignment frame ensured a perfect fit on my device's screen. Within minutes, I had a crystal-clear and bubble-free protector in place, fitting seamlessly to the contours of the screen along with tips to troubleshoot & remove bubbles, dust, etc.The quality of the LK screen protectors is exceptional. The ultra-thin yet robust construction maintains the responsiveness and clarity of the original screen, allowing for a seamless touch experience. The high-transparency feature ensures that the screen remains vivid and vibrant, without compromising on the brightness or color accuracy.Furthermore, the LK screen protectors boast impressive scratch resistance. Since using these protectors, I have been able to avoid any visible scratches or scuffs on my device's screen, even with the everyday wear and tear associated with regular use. This has given me peace of mind, especially when carrying my device in my pocket or bag along with other items.The oil-repellent coating is another outstanding feature worth mentioning. I have noticed a significant reduction in fingerprint smudges and oil residue on the screen since applying the LK screen protector. Additionally, the anti-glare properties of the protector minimize reflections and glare, making it easier to view the screen even in bright environments.In terms of durability, the LK screen protectors have exceeded my expectations. They have demonstrated excellent adhesive strength, staying securely in place without any signs of lifting or peeling. The protectors have proven to be highly durable and resilient, even after prolonged periods of use and exposure to daily elements.Lastly, the value for money that the LK 4 pack Screen Protectors offer is outstanding. With four protectors included in the package, I have spares to replace the protector if needed. This ensures long-term protection for my device, without the need to constantly repurchase new screen protectors.In conclusion, the LK 4 pack Screen Protectors have proven to be an excellent investment for maintaining the pristine condition of my device's screen. Their ease of installation, outstanding quality, scratch-resistant properties, and excellent value for the extremely reasonable cost make them a top choice for anyone seeking reliable and high-quality protection. I strongly recommend the LK screen protectors to anyone looking to safeguard their valuable device from scratches, smudges, and everyday wear and tear!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, great product, good installation instructions
reviews.reviewText: I highly recommend these screen protectors. I purchased my new iPhone at a local store and the store was selling screen protectors, $50 for one tempered glass screen protector. I couldn’t make myself do that and had a feeling I could find something of similar quality a lot cheaper. Fortunately, Amazon came through for me once again. You cannot beat the value of these screen protectors at 4 for $8. I was a little concerned about doing this myself as someone at the store where I purchased the original phone installed my first screen protector for me. However, the instructional video and instructions provided with the screen protectors explained the procedure quite well and I was able to install mine for the first time with no problems. I have had mine for over a month now, it’s working exactly as my old screen protector on my previous phone which I had for over six years and dropped many times. I’m sure it will continue to work just as well as it has been. But of course I have 3 back ups in case it doesn’t. One word of caution, however, if you can’t get a bubble out while you’re installing it and you lift the protector to try to remove the bubble, it doesn’t seem to reseal quite as well as it did originally. This happened to me in one corner, just a small area close to the edge, barely noticeable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Haven’t installed a screen protector under 5 minutes EVER! The system is so simple that’s no wonder it came with no instructions!These are my steps to success:- Just remove old/broken protector if any, lay your phone screen up in a clean surface- clean the screen with provided wiper pads and wipe screen with also provided screen cloth- slip/fit the frame/guide provided over your phone making sure the “TOP” side matches the top of your phone- VERY IMPORTANT!!! use the lint/dust round stickers to remove any possible invisible speckle of dust from screen- remove the backing of the screen protector to expose the sticky side (try keeping that facing down to avoid dust sticking to it before installation) and do it just before you’re sure it’s clean and you’re ready to install it- gently lay the protector on top of your screen starting by the top side against the frame/guide you have installed 2 steps ago- once it’s on the screen it will start pretty much gluing itself automatically but if not, it is as simple as touching/pressing one corner down and the process will start- YOU’RE DONE! Just watch it gluing itself to the screen and make sure no air pockets are leftSuper precise and the very first one which has left not one speckle of dust under/between the protector and screen! Super satisfied! Will update if the protector itself present low protection but so far it’s a keeper!

reviews.reviewTitle: タッチの感触感度良し
reviews.reviewText: ５月から12proで2ヶ月使用した感想、今まで他機種でガラスタイプの物やフイルムの物を使った事が有ります。画面をタッチする感触、反応は充分満足できる4枚入ってガイドも付いてこの値段は満足。半年で１枚交換と思ったが多分普通に使う分にはキズは入らないかと？

I have used many screen protectors. Of course the initial alignment and application of the protective glass screen is the most critical determinant of efficacy (how well it does its job which is protection), durability and enjoyment of these expensive, delicate and critical smart phone tools we are increasingly dependent on. An initial misalignment and attempt at repositioning is how air bubbles, debris (dust, hair) and fingerprints get introduced under your protector. Misalignment might also make reinstalling a tight, edge-protecting case impossible with out raising or fracturing the edge of your newly applied protector. LK’s advantage over other screens I’ve used is their alignment frame which essentially makes the whole procedure foolproof. Have used the product many times on multiple iterations of iPhone without ever introducing an air bubble or crack. Excellent and well priced. Durability is typical of higher end glass screens. Better if you consider how initial misalignment errors will increase the likelihood of early cracks or if a bubble or dust particle might drive you to distraction and cause you to ditch the screen and start over!
